trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Mountain Home
There were no other sightings in Mountain Home on or around October 31st 2001
divs: Sighting Details We were driving north on Hwy 201 North. We were4miles north of Mountain Home, Arkansas - We are in the center-top of state and10 miles south of Missouri border. It was 8:35p.m.We were startled by the light- we didnt expect to see a light there in the night sky.We thought it was amedior when we first saw it.Al needed to continue to drive at 55 miles per hour. We called out, what is that! We saw a bright light move streight from east towest at a 35 degree angle to the horizon. Above the west horizon it entered acloud-mist then droped streight down to the tree level. I had made animpossible right angle turn - down. We then knew it was not a metior.Itdisapeared infront of the tree line about less than 500 feet from the road.
